author: @infobae
title: Dennis Smith Jr., físico y talento NBA para reforzar al Real Madrid - Infobae
text:
Nueva York, 16 ene (EFE).- Con siete temporadas de experiencia en la mejor liga de baloncesto del planeta, Dennis Smith Jr., el nuevo fichaje del Real Madrid, aporta físico, potencia y talento NBA para reforzar las aspiraciones del club blanco.
El base, de 27 años y originario de Fayetteville (Carolina del Norte, EE.UU.), fue elegido en el puesto 9 del draft de la NBA de 2017 tras competir con North Carolina State en el baloncesto universitario.
Smith Jr. se estrenó en la NBA con los Dallas Mavericks y en su primera temporada logró sus mejores registros en la NBA con 15,2 puntos, 3,8 rebotes y 5,2 asistencias de media por encuentro en la campaña 2017-2018.
También fue su campaña con mayor presencia en la cancha con 69 partidos (todos ellos como titular), una cifra que nunca repitió después en la NBA.
Smith Jr. fue escogido para el segundo mejor equipo de novatos de esa temporada, pero no se consolidó en los Mavericks, que en 2018-2019 le entregaron las llaves de la franquicia al recién llegado Luka Doncic.
Así, Smith Jr. cambió Dallas por Nueva York en enero de 2019 como parte del traspaso que llevó a Kristaps Porzingis a la franquicia texana. Posteriormente pasó por los Detroit Pistons, los Portland Trail Blazers, los Charlotte Hornets y los Brooklyn Nets, para los que jugó en el curso 2023-2024 y que fueron su último equipo en la NBA.
En total disputó 326 partidos en temporada regular en la NBA (152 como titular) con unos promedios de 9,7 puntos, 3 rebotes y 4,2 asistencias por encuentro.
En su última campaña, Smith Jr. logró en Brooklyn 6,6 puntos, 2,9 rebotes, 3,6 asistencias y 1,2 robos de media por partido con un 43,5 % en tiros de campo y un 29,4 % en triples.
De 1,91 metros y 93 kilos según la web oficial de la NBA, el base participó en dos ocasiones (2018 y 2019) en el concurso de mates del All-Star de la NBA.
Su llegada supone un importante recurso adicional para el técnico Chus Mateo, que en el puesto de base contaba como principales opciones con el argentino Facundo Campazzo, el dominicano Andrés Feliz y el español Sergio Llull.
Esta será la primera experiencia del jugador estadounidense en el baloncesto europeo, pero antes de cruzar el Atlántico habló con dos personas que le recomendaron fichar por el conjunto merengue: su excompañero Doncic y el ahora entrenador de los Nets, el español Jordi Fernández.
"Tuve una charla con Jordi Fernández, entrenador de los Brooklyn Nets, y me habló muy bien del club, y Luka Doncic también. Así que no tuve que pensar mucho en el momento que decidí salir al extranjero (...). Doncic me habló muy bien de la ciudad, me dijo que le encanta", afirmó en un comunicado divulgado por el Real Madrid.
"Vengo a aportar intensidad, ser capaz de pisar la zona, asistir a los compañeros y ser uno de los mejores defensas de la Liga. Hay que tener una mentalidad ganadora, ayudar a mis compañeros a estar en su máximo nivel y encajar en el vestuario", apuntó. EFE

author: Redacción El Debate
title: Frío, heladas y niebla serán los protagonistas de este fin de semana en casi toda España
text:
Frío, heladas y niebla serán los protagonistas de este fin de semana en casi toda España
El sábado y domingo estarán marcados por un anticiclón que estabilizará la atmósfera y despejará los cielos
El tiempo anticiclónico dominará los próximos días en la Península y Baleares, según Rubén del Campo, portavoz de la Agencia Estatal de Meteorología (Aemet). Esto provocará madrugadas frías con heladas en el interior y la formación de bancos de niebla en la meseta y valles de grandes ríos, especialmente en el norte, donde podrían ser persistentes.
Aunque las temperaturas serán frías, propias de la estación, se espera un aumento progresivo a mediados de semana, particularmente entre miércoles y jueves, con un ambiente algo más templado antes de que los valores vuelvan a descender. En cuanto a precipitaciones, serán escasas durante el fin de semana y los primeros días de la próxima semana, aunque es posible que un frente asociado a una borrasca atlántica deje lluvias en el norte y oeste de la Península a partir del miércoles, especialmente en Galicia. En Canarias, se esperan vientos intensos durante el fin de semana, con lluvias el domingo en el archipiélago.
En las últimas 24 horas previas al viernes, se acumularon 63 litros por metro cuadrado en Estartit (Gerona) y 54 l/m² en Málaga Aeropuerto, aunque la inestabilidad disminuirá. El viernes comenzará con chubascos en el área mediterránea, que irán remitiendo durante el día. Las temperaturas subirán en el sureste, rondando los 18 °C, mientras que en el resto del país predominará un ambiente más frío. En Canarias, podría haber lluvias débiles en las islas montañosas.
El sábado y domingo estarán marcados por un anticiclón que estabilizará la atmósfera y despejará los cielos. Las temperaturas nocturnas bajarán, con heladas en amplias zonas del interior, y las diurnas subirán. En la meseta norte y páramos del centro, los valores oscilarán entre -2 °C y -4 °C, con posibles descensos mayores en áreas concretas. Durante el día, el norte de la Península, excepto Galicia y las comunidades cantábricas, no superará los 10°C, mientras que en el sur y la zona mediterránea los termómetros alcanzarán de 18 °C a 20 °C.
En Canarias, una borrasca al oeste traerá vientos fuertes durante el fin de semana, especialmente en las islas occidentales, junto con lluvias persistentes el domingo y calima. Las temperaturas superarán los 25 °C en las zonas costeras, llegando incluso a 30 °C el lunes, aunque luego se normalizarán.
El lunes será estable en la Península, con heladas en el interior y temperaturas superiores a 10 °C excepto en zonas con niebla persistente. Estas condiciones se mantendrán el martes, aunque con heladas menos extensas. Las lluvias aparecerán solo en Galicia a últimas horas, mientras Canarias verá un descenso de temperaturas y menos calima.
A partir del miércoles, un frente avanzará desde Galicia, dejando lluvias en el norte y oeste de la Península. Las temperaturas subirán, reduciendo heladas, aunque podrían bajar nuevamente después.

author: ahamelin@newscenter1.com (Anna Hamelin)
title: Rural Meade County schoolteacher receives 1+1 award, teaches Kindergarten through 8th grade
text:
UNION CENTER, S.D.- Missy Urbaniak teaches kindergarten through eight grade at Atall School in rural Meade County. She was nominated to receive the 1+1 award from NewsCenter1 and First Interstate Bank, which gifts her with $500 to use for her classroom.
Inspired to Teach
"I had grandparents, great grandparents, who were teachers, and some of them even taught in country schools out here in Meade County. So even though I didn't grow up out here and I didn't attend a country school, it was part of my growing up," Urbaniak adds.
After marrying a local rancher, she returned to rural Meade County and had the opportunity follow her own elementary school dream. "It just was a given that this was where I was meant to be. It's what I've wanted to do since I was a fourth grader, was to teach. So it just fits," she says.
Small school benefits
Urbaniak adds that small schools provide a variety of benefits, from individualized lesson plans to friendships that transcend grade levels. "To see that growth and have that kind of experience with them is really unique. But also really rewarding because you see exactly how much progress they make year to year, and then you can build on it so much easier. So that's a really a good benefit," she explains. "It's great that the older kids are here for the younger kids to watch. They learn so much just from watching each other."
Money for books
Urbaniak hopes to buy binoculars for her students so that they can more closely observe wildlife from the classroom and expand her book collection. "With teaching a span of nine levels, I need all kinds of books, and so that'll be my first, my first purchase probably."
To nominate your favorite teacher for the 1+1 Giveaway, click
here.

author: Zak Doffman
title: Deleting Facebook Surges In Popularity-Sudden Decision Pushes Users To Quit
text:
Another interesting week for Meta, as the response to its sudden decision to “ abandon the use of independent fact checkers ” on Facebook raises hackles worldwide. “Starting in the U.S., we are ending our third party fact-checking program and moving to a Community Notes model,” CEO Mark Zuckerberg posted on Tuesday, with his new plan to adopt the same form of audience monitoring that Elon Musk has introduced to X (formerly Twitter).
But less than 48-hours later, as first noticed by TechCrunch , the move prompted a viral surge in “Google searches for how to cancel and delete Facebook, Instagram, and Threads accounts.” The news site described the data — pulled from Google Trends — as “explosive,” noting that “the consequences of Meta’s new policies could have serious implications for the types of posts, hateful and violent speech, and misinformation that can spread even faster than they already do.”
Forbes Why You Need A New Messaging App—iPhone, Android Warning By Zak Doffman Commenting on the surge, Gizmodo suggested that “apparently not everyone is ready to live in a post-truth world... Fittingly, Facebook competitors are also seeing a spike in interest. Bluesky saw a nearly 1,000% increase in searches during the same period that saw people looking to exit the Meta-verse of social apps.”
According to TechCrunch , “the backlash has been swift. Interest in searches related to getting off Meta platforms soared this week, particularly in the last two days. Google searches for terms like ‘how to permanently delete facebook’ hit a maximum score of 100 — the highest level of interest possible on Google Trends.”
California Wildfire Live Updates: Palisades Fire Spreads To Nearly 20,000 Acres—As Death Toll From All Fires Reaches 7 What To Expect From Trump’s Hush Money Sentencing Tomorrow—As Supreme Court Refuses To Stop It BTS’ J-Hope Announces First Solo Tour ‘Hope On The Stage’: Details Deleting Facebook — or not — has been a recurring theme over the years, as the company has built a social media empire that touches more than half the world’s population. But it has survived backlash after backlash, as various parts of its algorithmic-driven data harvesting have come under increasing scrutiny. But ultimately users need their fix and there are few if any alternatives — there will be even less if TikTok is actually banned in the U.S.
“It’s time to get back to our roots around free expression,” Zuckerberg explained, adding that he “started building social media to give people a voice.” Moving forward, Facebook will see the same community notes “we’ve seen work on X – where they empower their community to decide when posts are potentially misleading and need more context, and people across a diverse range of perspectives decide what sort of context is helpful for other users to see.”
Forbes Google’s Gmail Upgrade—Do Not Lose Your Account By Zak Doffman Quite what happens next is anybody’s guess — but pushing responsibility for censoring and correcting content back onto the audience and away from the company does resolve accusations around company bias. And with the Trump administration just days from office, there may be some necessary thinking behind all this.
I have reached out to Meta for any comments on this sudden surge in appetite for deletion.
So, should you delete Facebook? Probably not. There’s little point. It knows who you are, where you live, what you do and who you hang out with. Its trackers underpin much of your internet use, and it has apps for every occasion. But you should definitely check the privacy settings on your devices and be mindful of what you post, search and transact when using its apps or sites. As for community notes versus fact checkers — that’s probably a case of no right answers and least worst options. The reality is there has always been too much of the wrong content and no-one has yet solved the problem.

author: Dec ; A Falun Dafa Practitioner
title: Listening to Master Li and Repaying Resentment with Kindness | Falun Dafa - Minghui.org
text: (Minghui.org) I only completed elementary school through the third grade, so I was unable to read well. When I attended a group [Fa] study at the beginning, I could not read [, the main book of Falun Dafa, in its entirety. Therefore I listened to fellow practitioners read the Fa. Later on, each person in the group study began to read a paragraph of the Fa and helped each other with any words they didn’t recognize. I made up my mind to overcome my difficulties in order to read Dafa books on my own. Zhuan Falun](https://en.falundafa.org/eng/zfl2014/zfl_2014.html) From then on, whenever it was my turn to read in our group Fa study, I would persist at reading the Fa, and ask my fellow practitioners when I did not recognize a word. After returning home, I insisted on reading the Fa by myself and got my children to help as needed. Later, my children taught me how to look words up in a dictionary. I copied the words that I did not understand and tried to memorize them. I learned more words as time passed, and finally, I was able to read entire paragraphs, like everyone else in the group study. I couldn’t have been happier at that time. Dealing with Favoring Sons Over Daughters My in-laws, having lived in a rural area, held the old concept of favoring sons over daughters. Because my husband’s younger brother had a boy, and my family had a girl, my in-laws planned to live with their younger son in their old age. So they spent all their money and energy on helping my brother-in-law’s family. They helped take care of their grandson, helped them work, and gave them money. As for our family, our in-laws did not take care of our girl and did not allow us to pick vegetables from their fields. My brother-in-law even took my bicycle, which was my wedding gift from my family. I was so angry that I started fighting with my mother-in-law, and told her that I would hold a grudge for the rest of my life. Our relationship became very tense. Later, according to the in-laws’ wishes, they lived with their younger son, but each family contributed to the in-laws’ living expenses. My brother-in-law’s family suddenly kicked the parents out of the house in 2000 because my father-in-law was suffering from dementia and sometimes urinated in the house regardless of whether anyone else was around. He made a mess, and the place smelled terrible. At this point, my in-laws were too old to contribute any money or effort to my brother-in-law’s family. My husband wanted to take care of his parents in our home, but he was worried about the quarrels I had with his mother and his younger brother. My thought was that I am a Falun Dafa practitioner now, and Dafa teaches people to follow Truthfulness-Compassion-Forbearance. I should be a good person and consider others wherever I am, without holding grudges against anyone. So we discussed the issue of bringing his parents to our house. However, our place was on the sixth floor in a city. When my father-in-law got confused, he often opened the window, wanting to walk outside to bring the livestock back. Being concerned about my father-in-law’s safety, I talked to my husband about moving to a relative’s empty house in the countryside. Upon arriving at the drafty thatched farmhouse, I burst into tears and wondered: “Is this place livable? What can we do to make this work?” Nevertheless, when I thought of Master Li’s (Dafa’s founder) teachings, my mind calmed down immediately, and I was no longer worried about the issue: “When it’s difficult to endure, you can endure it. When it’s impossible to do, you can do it.” (Lecture Nine, [Zhuan Falun](https://en.falundafa.org/eng/zfl2014/zfl_2014_9.html#6)) From that day on I took care of my in-laws’ daily needs without despising them, and never mentioning how they treated me in the past. My mother-in-law saw the changes in me and felt very sorry. She secretly cried and regretted that she gave all her strength and property to her younger son, but then ended up in such a bad situation in her old age. I tried to comfort her by assuring her: “You can live here without worries, and I will definitely treat you well. Now, I have learned Falun Dafa. Master Li teaches us to be good people who follow the principles of Truthfulness, Compassion and Forbearance, and to look inward when encountering problems. Dafa has changed me. I will not hold onto any past grudges. I hope you can also understand the wonder of Falun Dafa.” She sincerely replied. “Falun Dafa is so good!” The relatives in the village saw that I cared for my in-laws wholeheartedly regardless of past grudges. Even though I moved to the countryside, my friends from the city often brought me things. The relatives talked about my story of becoming better after practicing Falun Dafa and taking care of my in-laws despite not receiving anything from them before. Moreover, it is very hard for anyone to leave the more comfortable living in the city and come to suffer in the countryside. They concluded, “Falun Dafa is so good! Look at the real live examples around us, and don’t believe what is said on TV.” Given the persecutory situation in China, many fellow practitioners’ families were afraid to or did not have the conditions to establish Fa study groups. Many practitioners who were persecuted lost their environment to study the Fa after they returned home. I thought that the group Fa study was a form of cultivation that Master told us to do. It will definitely work because it is what Master wants. I told my husband about my wish to set up a Fa study group at home so practitioners can improve together. I first [clarified the truth] to him about Dafa and the persecution. My husband had witnessed Dafa’s wonders and extraordinary nature from my cultivation experiences, so he agreed to my idea and did many things to support Dafa. He received benefits from Dafa and remained energetic and healthy in his 70s. Over the past 10 years, many different fellow practitioners came to study the Fa at our house. Everyone cherished this precious group Fa-study environment. They paid attention to safety and did not bring mobile phones when studying the Fa. We sent forth righteous thoughts collectively before studying the Fa. While studying, we focused our minds. After studying we discussed specific topics, so we could make progress as one body, based on the Fa, without wasting time of talking about ordinary matters. Under Master’s compassionate protection, our Fa-study group has been going smoothly without interruption. Copyright © 2023 Minghui.org. All rights reserved.
